sections.general:
INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY INTERN
Professional Profile
To obtain a full time in the Entry Level Information Technology Management field where I can utilize my education to contribute to company's
operations and learning opportunities where I can maximize my skills, and advanced training development.
Qualifications
Microsoft Word, Power Point, and Excel
